description: Subject attribute node to capture public metadata specific to individual subject, at time of study start.

family_history.description: Do you have a family history of hereditary diseases or physiological conditions (e.g. both my grandfather on my father's side and my father had diabetes), or are you of high risk of any disease? If so, please describe.

rx.description: List all prescriptions and over the counter medication patient is taking at start of study.

diabetes.description: Does patient have diabetes (including gestational)? Yes/No, duration

hypertension.description: Does patient have hypertension? Yes/No, duration

hyperlipidemia.description: Does patient have hyperlipidemia? Yes/No, duration

cad.description: Does patient have coronary artery disease/myocardial infarction? Yes/No, duration

pvd.description: Does patient have peripheral vascular disease? Yes/No, duration

chf.description: Does patient have chronic heart failure? Yes/No, duration

gallbladder.description: Does patient have gallbladder disease? Yes/No, duration, clarification

liver.description: Does patient have liver disease? Yes/No, duration, clarification

kidney.description: Does patient have kidney disease? Yes/No, duration

pancreatitis.description: Does patient have pancreatitis? Yes/No, duration

osa.description: Does patient have obstructive sleep apnea? Yes/No, duration

asthma.description: Does patient have asthma? Yes/No, duration

lmp.description: When was patient's last menstrual period, if applicable.

tobacco.description: What is patient's baseline tobacco use, measured as number of packs per day x years smoked.

alcohol.description: What is patient's baseline alcohol consumption; type, drinks/week.

illicit_drug.description: What is patient's baseline illicit drug history?

aerobics.description: What is patient's baseline aerobic exercise level; type, minutes/week.

contact.description: Does patient agree to be contacted in the future?

subtype.description: The subtype of the Visit Attribute.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.
